descriptionHTML:
Model Number: FR-A01

First Edition of Frillroid's FR-A01 Analogue Watchface

Download this elegant analogue Watchface suitable for a number of different occasions. Keeping in mind the elegance of a wrist watch and still making it more use able this watch face is designed for your smart watch. It has analogue design that displays a beautiful background, time and date along with the remaining battery life.

How it works?
It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen.
comments: Nice Watch Face One Request Nice clean watch face. Request the "date"  be cleaned up a little. A little hard to see!
